title: Using Ludwig on Google colab - ImportError: Cannot load backend 'TkAgg'
body:
I am trying to use Ludwig on Google colab. I can install using pip. But when I try to import Ludwig model  (from ludwig import LudwigModel) or use this through the command line interface, I get the following error --


---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-4-f06c687442c8> in <module>()
----> 1 from ludwig import LudwigModel

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/ludwig/__init__.py in <module>()
     15 # ==============================================================================
     16 from ludwig.api import LudwigModel
---> 17 from ludwig.cli import CLI
     18 from ludwig.globals import LUDWIG_VERSION as __version__

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/ludwig/cli.py in <module>()
     22 from ludwig import predict
     23 from ludwig import train
---> 24 from ludwig import visualize
     25 
     26 

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/ludwig/visualize.py in <module>()
     30 
     31 from ludwig.constants import *
---> 32 from ludwig.utils import visualization_utils
     33 from ludwig.utils.data_utils import load_json, load_from_file
     34 from ludwig.utils.print_utils import logging_level_registry

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/ludwig/utils/visualization_utils.py in <module>()
     26 from matplotlib.lines import Line2D
     27 
---> 28 mpl.use('TkAgg')  # make matplotlib run on mac os
     29 import matplotlib.patches as patches
     30 import matplotlib.path as path

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/matplotlib/__init__.py in use(arg, warn, force)
   1389         if force:
   1390             from matplotlib.pyplot import switch_backend
-> 1391             switch_backend(name)
   1392     # Finally if pyplot is not imported update both rcParams and
   1393     # rcDefaults so restoring the defaults later with rcdefaults

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/matplotlib/pyplot.py in switch_backend(newbackend)
    220                 "Cannot load backend {!r} which requires the {!r} interactive "
    221                 "framework, as {!r} is currently running".format(
--> 222                     newbackend, required_framework, current_framework))
    223 
    224     rcParams['backend'] = rcParamsDefault['backend'] = newbackend

ImportError: Cannot load backend 'TkAgg' which requires the 'tk' interactive framework, as 'headless' is currently running

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
NOTE: If your import is failing due to a missing package, you can
manually install dependencies using either !pip or !apt.

To view examples of installing some common dependencies, click the
